attributes.action: create tax breaks for people who are Sexy Popular (and don't care who knows it)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sexy and Popular people are the engine of this country's historical prosperity and future development. What do Charles Dickens, John Locke and Emma Bunton have in common? That's right: they are amazingly popular and definitely sexy. So why should S & P people pay the same taxes as U & U (Ugly and Unloved) people? We demand a 30% reduction in income tax for S & P people, like, yesterday. That is all.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
